column4: Hello. I was wondering if anyone could give me assistance setting up partitions. I'm on Lucid, and had to install to a USB memory stick due to my HD dying. THing is I'm rnning out of space..
Is it possible to set up the apps folder on a partition on another memory stick?
have you tried freeing up some space? « sudo apt-get clean »
yes. I've tried that, localepurge, blechbit etc. It helps some but not enough.
